item.title: Dalit Woman Dies Fighting Love Betrayal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: A Dalit woman who had been staging a protest for three months in front of a police constableâ€™s residence, accusing him of cheating her on the pretext of love and marriage, died under suspicious circumstances in Gadwal district on Saturday. Following the incident, Jogulamba Gadwal superintendent of police (SP) T. Srinivasa Rao suspended the constable, Raghunath Goud, and directed that a case be registered against him.
According to the police, Raghunath, a constable from Chinnonipalli ...]]>
item.author: Mouli Mareedu, About The Author
